reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

RDA/ Velocity Coil/ 6 Wrap Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 wrap W/ 45 Wicking/ Full Rayon Ω/0.26

**Testing**

Steep Time/3 weeks % Used/ 1.5
PG/VG 50/50 Nic%/0

**Mouth Feel**

Heavy on the tongue and white on the nose, fairly dense 8 out of 10.

**Throat Hit**4/10

**Flavor Properties**

Sweet strong honey flavor that stands out on top, with a light creaminess and a hint of what I believe is hazelnut.

**Relatable Flavors**

This reminds me of honey candies like bit-o-honey, and homemade honey taffy.

**Position In The Recipe**

Should work well as a base to build upon, but I think it's best application it's going to be as a accent, adding a little honey flavoring and sweetness to a recipe.

**Pairings**

Bakeries, creams, other candies, and tobaccos.

**Notes**

Here is some more information on nougat  along with a recipe for pure honey Taffy one of my favorites.

 http://www.ecigexpress.com/diy-e-liquid/diy-e-liquid-flavors/inawera/fruit-and-sweet/nougat-by-inawera-10ml.html

 http://www.bullcityvapor.com/nugat-inw/

 https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nougat

 http://www.instructables.com/id/Pure-Honey-Taffy/

**Rating** 60/100

*Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.*
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Nugat
